ingredients: 10 lbs - Pale Ale Malt, Northwestern (Great Western) (3.0 SRM) (Grain)
1.0 oz - Golding US Pellet Type 90 [5.0%] - Boil 60 min (Hops)
1.0 oz - Hallertauer Pellet Type 90 [3.9%] - Boil 25 min (Hops)
1.0 oz - Williamette Pellet Type 90 [4.8%] - Boil 5 min (Hops)
name: Moose Drool Brown Ale
